text: Alex Vinatzer (born 22 September 1999) is an Italian World Cup alpine ski racer.Profile at the Italian Olympic Committee official website He specializes in slalom and competed in the 2018 Winter Olympics, and the 2019 World Championships. Born in Bolzano, South Tyrol, Vinatzer made his World Cup debut in November 2017 and his first podium in January 2020 at Zagreb, Croatia. ==World Cup results== ===Season standings=== {| class=wikitable style="text- align:center" !
